sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.cusProjectTask</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>cusProjectTask</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var cusProjectTask = Class.create();
cusProjectTask.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.PROJECT_TASK = 'pm_project_task';
    },

    createDemandTask: function(projParent, shortDesc) {

        var projTask = new GlideRecord(this.PROJECT_TASK);
        projTask.initialize();
        projTask.parent = projParent;
        projTask.short_description = shortDesc;
        projTask.correlation_display = shortDesc;
        projTask.insert();

    },
    type: 'cusProjectTask'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>Gokul Nath</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-09-12 09:27:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>768b296c479d3510020ba9f8536d43b2</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>cusProjectTask</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_768b296c479d3510020ba9f8536d43b2</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:25:13</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
